title.rendered: His Excellency Yusuf Maitama Tuggar received the official visit of H.E. Mr. Vladimir Voronkov, Under-Secretary General of the United Nations Office of Counter- Terrorism (UNOCT)

content.rendered:
The Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, His Excellency Yusuf Maitama Tuggar received the official visit of H.E. Mr. Vladimir Voronkov, Under-Secretary General of the United Nations Office of Counter-Terrorism (UNOCT) and his team today, 29th August, 2023.
Discussions centred on strengthening cooperation ahead of the High-Level International Conference on Counter-Terrorism fixed for October, 2023.

excerpt.rendered: The Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, His Excellency Yusuf Maitama Tuggar received the official visit of H.E. Mr. Vladimir Voronkov, Under-Secretary General of the United Nations Office of Counter-Terrorism (UNOCT) and his team today, 29th August, 2023. Discussions centred on strengthening cooperation ahead of the High-Level International Conference on Counter-Terrorism fixed for October, 2023.
